languages.text: "Давайте начнем с главного. Как так вышло, что Хейнрикс ван Калокс, которого вашей почтенной предшественнице было поручено доставить ко мне, покинул этот мир? Признаюсь, я очень не люблю, когда мои агенты гибнут — как правило, по их кровавому следу я выхожу на очень неприятные и неблагочестивые секреты".

traits.locale_text: "И первый из них — как так вышло, что Хейнрикс ван Калокс, которого вашей почтенной предшественнице было поручено доставить ко мне, покинул этот мир? Признаюсь, я очень не люблю, когда мои агенты гибнут — как правило, это значит, что людям, бывшим рядом с ними в момент их смерти, есть что скрывать".

languages.text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."
languages.original_text: "Давайте начнем с главного. Как так вышло, что Хейнрикс ван Калокс, которого вашей почтенной предшественнице было поручено доставить ко мне, покинул этот мир? Признаюсь, я очень не люблю, когда мои агенты гибнут — как правило, по их кровавому следу я выхожу на очень неприятные и неблагочестивые секреты".

traits.locale_text: "Now, if you would be so kind as to explain to me — how did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

"Now, if you would be so kind as to explain to me — how did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

"Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

"Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

"Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

languages.text: 「さて、一番重要な議題から始めよう。お前の栄誉ある前任はハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスを私の元へ連れてくる指示を受けたが、この星を発ってからハインリックスに起きたことを教えてもらおうか？正直言って、私の職員が死ぬのは非常に気分が悪い。彼らの血痕を追うと、極めて不快かつ悪辣な秘密を目にすることが多いのでな」
languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、一番重要な議題から始めよう。お前の栄誉ある前任はハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスを私の元へ連れてくる指示を受けたが、この星を発ってからハインリックスに起きたことを教えてもらおうか？正直言って、私の職員が死ぬのは非常に気分が悪い。彼らの血痕を追うと、極めて不快かつ悪辣な秘密を目にすることが多いのでな」

languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

languages.text: “还是从最重要的事情谈起吧。我曾命令你那位受人尊敬的前任，将海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯带到我身边，可他怎么就死了？说实话，我很难接受侍从的死亡。每当我追随着他们的血迹追查，等待我的往往是最阴暗、最邪恶的秘密。”
languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

traits.locale_text: “还是从最重要的事情谈起吧。我曾命令你那位受人尊敬的前任，将海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯带到我身边，可他怎么就死了？说实话，我很难接受侍从的死亡。每当我追随着他们的血迹追查，等待我的往往是最阴暗、最邪恶的秘密。”

languages.text: «Pasemos al asunto más importante de todos. ¿Cómo dejó Heinrix van Calox, a quien su honorable predecesora debía traerme, este mundo? Debo admitir que me molesta mucho que mis agentes mueran. Al seguir el rastro sangriento, suelo encontrar secretos muy desagradables y perversos».
languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

traits.locale_text: «Pasemos al asunto más importante de todos. ¿Cómo dejó Heinrix van Calox, a quien su honorable predecesora debía traerme, este mundo? Debo admitir que me molesta mucho que mis agentes mueran. Al seguir el rastro sangriento, suelo encontrar secretos muy desagradables y perversos».

languages.text: « Et maintenant, abordons le sujet le plus important. Comment se fait-il qu'Heinrix van Calox, que j'avais chargé votre honorable prédécesseure de me ramener, ait quitté ce monde ? La mort de mes agents n'est pas pour me réjouir, surtout qu'il me suffit en général de remonter les traces de sang pour mettre au jour des secrets on ne peut plus déplaisants. »
languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, abordons le sujet le plus important. Comment se fait-il qu'Heinrix van Calox, que j'avais chargé votre honorable prédécesseure de me ramener, ait quitté ce monde ? La mort de mes agents n'est pas pour me réjouir, surtout qu'il me suffit en général de remonter les traces de sang pour mettre au jour des secrets on ne peut plus déplaisants. »

languages.text: "Lasst uns nun mit dem wichtigsten Thema beginnen. Wie kann es sein, dass Heinrix van Calox, den Eure geehrte Vorgängerin zu mir bringen sollte, Abschied von dieser Welt genommen hat? Ich muss zugeben, es stört mich sehr, wenn meine Agenten sterben – wenn ich dann die Blutspur verfolge, stoße ich meist auf höchst unangenehme und ruchlose Geheimnisse."
languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst uns nun mit dem wichtigsten Thema beginnen. Wie kann es sein, dass Heinrix van Calox, den Eure geehrte Vorgängerin zu mir bringen sollte, Abschied von dieser Welt genommen hat? Ich muss zugeben, es stört mich sehr, wenn meine Agenten sterben – wenn ich dann die Blutspur verfolge, stoße ich meist auf höchst unangenehme und ruchlose Geheimnisse."

languages.text: "Şimdi, en önemli konuyla başlayalım. Onurlu selefinin bana getirmekle görevlendirildiği Heinrix van Calox, bu dünyadan nasıl göçebildi? İtiraf etmeliyim ki emrimdekiler öldüklerinde bunu oldukça tatsız bulurum zira kanlarının izini sürdüğümde, genellikle son derece nahoş ve kötücül sırlar keşfetme eğilimindeyimdir."
languages.original_text: "Now, let us start with the most important subject. How did it come to pass that Heinrix van Calox, whom your honoured predecessor was instructed to bring to me, departed from this world? I must admit, I find it highly objectionable when my agents die — by following their bloody trail, I tend to discover extremely unpleasant and nefarious secrets."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi, en önemli konuyla başlayalım. Onurlu selefinin bana getirmekle görevlendirildiği Heinrix van Calox bu dünyadan nasıl göçebildi? İtiraf etmeliyim ki emrimdekiler öldüklerinde bunu oldukça tatsız bulurum ve onların kanlarının izini sürdüğümde genellikle son derece nahoş ve kötücül sırlar keşfetme eğilimindeyimdir."
